intro_questions.text: Can you spell your family name, please?

main_questions.text: What do you like to eat?
What is your favorite book genre?

respond_situations.description: You are in a shop. You ask about a shirt price.

respond_situations.starter_line: Excuse me, where is the bus stop?
What do you want to drink?
respond_situations.description: You are at a café. You choose a drink.

ask_situations.instruction: You are at school. Ask your friend for help with homework.
You want to ask a friend to go for ice cream. ..
You are shopping. Ask the shopkeeper where the bread is.

listening_script.text: I eat fruit every day. Fruit is healthy and tasty. I like apples and bananas. I eat fruit for breakfast. Fruit gives me energy.

questions.question: What do I eat every day?

monologue.topic: Talk about your friends at school

follow_up_questions.question: Who is your best friend at school?
What games do you play with your friends?
When do you see your friends at school?
Where do you like to sit with your friends?
